The '''Tomb of Martek''' was a citadel in which [[Martek]] laid down his mortal remains after his death.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|108}}
document_data.History: Before his death, Martek used the building that would later become the tomb as a citadel. He kept a number of tests in it to ensure that uninvited visitors would be at least entertaining; three of those tests had been solved by the time he died, leaving only two: the [[Mobius Tower]] and the [[Black Abyss]]. Before he died, he stole away the [[Desert of Al-Alisk]], including the ruins of [[Akhir]] and the [[Crypt of Al-Alisk]] to serve as another such test in his tomb.
